title: Who Are We?
text: The University of Melbourne Cheer and Dance Club is one of the university's newest sports affiliated teams. As a representative of Melbourne University, our Cheer and Dance club is one of Victoria's premier squads.
We pride ourselves on being a friendly and supportive club that achieves strong competition results through our dedication and passion.

title: Come Join!
text: The Melbourne University Cheer and Dance Club began in 2012 with only 24 members, and has now offers cheerleading alongside the multiple dance styles of pom, lyrical, hip-hop and jazz.
Come join us in 2024! You will not regret it! Our club offers a large range of teams meaning that all potential athletes will be able to find a team to suit them!

title: History
text: In 2017, our All Star pom team, MU Heat, not only received 1st place and pom grand champions at DCE's Asia Pacific Grand Internationals, they also received a bid to compete at the Dance Worlds in Orlando, Florida in 2018! They went on to place 9th in the world, the only Australian All-Girl Open Pom team to place Top 10 in history!
